programme.title: Singing With Angels
programme.desc: Faced with a crossroads in her life, Aubrey reflects on her experiences in joining the Mormon Tabernacle Choir and how they have strengthened her and her family through their challenges.

programme.title: Runaway Romance
programme.desc: Reality TV star Ann Stanway leaves Hollywood and finds herself in Amish country where she discovers friendship, new love and ultimately herself. In the end, Ann must decide between staying in her newfound reality or returning to her old one.

programme.title: A Royal Surprise
programme.desc: When Riley's boyfriend, Mandla, invites her to South Africa to meet his family, she is shocked to discover that he is a prince. The news puts Riley's trust in Mandla in jeopardy, and he must do what he can to win her love back.

programme.title: The Shunning
programme.desc: All her life Katie Lapp has longed for the forbidden things, but will her dreams come at a price too dear to pay? Why would Katie’s mother, a plain and simple Amish-woman who embraces the old ways, hide a beautiful satin baby dress in the attic? The staggering answers come on the eve of Katie’s wedding to widower, Bishop John Beiler, with the arrival of a beautiful “Englisher” woman who has been searching for her, throwing Katie’s life – present and future – into confusion.

programme.title: Cinderella in the Caribbean
programme.desc: Ashlyn Vanderbilt travels with her stepmother Miriam and her fiancé Bruce for their destination wedding. Although Ashlyn finds friendship and love with Bruce's son, Noah, she struggles to have her happily ever after when she discovers that her stepfamily plans to ruin Bruce.

programme.title: Tails of Christmas
programme.desc: A military veteran searches for purpose in his life after an injury cut his career short. He finds it in a kind woman who runs an animal shelter. As they work together to find animals homes during the Christmas adoption season, they develop feelings for each other, and help each other with the challenges each faces.

programme.title: A Christmas of Wonders
programme.desc: Eliza, a writer for travel magazines and websites, has returned to her small hometown after an absence. Despite the passage of time, not much has changed in the town, and her family continues to participate in the same traditions. Through these activities, Eliza is reunited with Will, a former heartthrob, who helps her rediscover the significance of these family traditions.

programme.title: Christmas Cupcakes
programme.desc: With their family bakery facing foreclosure, two sisters must team-up to try and save it by entering a TV baking competition.

programme.title: Runaway Romance
programme.desc: Reality TV star Ann Stanway leaves Hollywood and finds herself in Amish country where she discovers friendship, new love and ultimately herself. In the end, Ann must decide between staying in her newfound reality or returning to her old one.

programme.title: Austentatious
programme.desc: Lizzie gets excited when she lands a new real estate client, but it ends up being Collin, who isn't as subtle with his interest as he thinks. Elinor unexpectedly gets a promotion, but before she can celebrate, she learns that the promotion makes her the one to deal with the IRS when her employer’s company comes under investigation. The IRS agent she deals with is Edward Ferrars, and a pleasant surprise from the typical IRS agent she expected. Emma and her coworker Mr. Darcy have to work on a case together. Emma finds her legal methods are different from Darcy’s, and frustration ensues until both can stop to understand the other’s perspective.

programme.title: Austentatious
programme.sub-title: Hit Me With Your Best Shot
programme.desc: Lizzie deals with coordinating her family’s wardrobe for a family portrait, with constant resistance to her ideas and suggestions of wild animal prints from her mother. Marianne gets a job at Yum Divine (a dessert bistro of sorts), but repeatedly messes up to the point of having her new job on the chopping block. Through Elinor’s insistence, and everyone’s help, Marianne hangs on to her job—barely. Grant figures out that Emma’s love of match-making comes as a therapy for all the divorce cases she handles. He recounts all the terrible dates Emma has sent him on. Lizzie learns that Grant might just love Emma.

programme.title: The Shunning
programme.desc: All her life Katie Lapp has longed for the forbidden things, but will her dreams come at a price too dear to pay? Why would Katie’s mother, a plain and simple Amish-woman who embraces the old ways, hide a beautiful satin baby dress in the attic? The staggering answers come on the eve of Katie’s wedding to widower, Bishop John Beiler, with the arrival of a beautiful “Englisher” woman who has been searching for her, throwing Katie’s life – present and future – into confusion.

programme.title: Cinderella in the Caribbean
programme.desc: Ashlyn Vanderbilt travels with her stepmother Miriam and her fiancé Bruce for their destination wedding. Although Ashlyn finds friendship and love with Bruce's son, Noah, she struggles to have her happily ever after when she discovers that her stepfamily plans to ruin Bruce.

programme.title: The Importance Of Being Mike
programme.desc: One of Ali's co-workers, named Mike, takes her dancing - sort of.

programme.title: The Importance Of Being Mike
programme.desc: Ali meets another Mike who likes to be a little too close for comfort.

programme.title: Tails of Christmas
programme.desc: A military veteran searches for purpose in his life after an injury cut his career short. He finds it in a kind woman who runs an animal shelter. As they work together to find animals homes during the Christmas adoption season, they develop feelings for each other, and help each other with the challenges each faces.

programme.title: A Christmas of Wonders
programme.desc: Eliza, a writer for travel magazines and websites, has returned to her small hometown after an absence. Despite the passage of time, not much has changed in the town, and her family continues to participate in the same traditions. Through these activities, Eliza is reunited with Will, a former heartthrob, who helps her rediscover the significance of these family traditions.

programme.title: Christmas Cupcakes
programme.desc: With their family bakery facing foreclosure, two sisters must team-up to try and save it by entering a TV baking competition.

programme.title: Meet Me In New York
programme.desc: Ambitious New York events planner Kelly is one of the best in the business. But when Joe, a stubborn, but influential website editor, hires her to organize his niece's birthday, Kelly soon realizes that she may have met her match.
